title: Author's L2 Interlude server on the Classic client
welcome_info_2: The server has now entered the alpha testing stage. The server is already open, you can already log in and enjoy your favorite game. There is no donation on the server, which makes our project absolutely unique.
welcome_info_3: In the "files" section, a patched client and updater are already available. Considering that we are only in alpha testing, there may be bugs that the administration will try to quickly eliminate.
welcome_info_4: The server has only one enthusiastic developer. There WILL BE NO donations on the server. In the future, there will be a paid subscription, but there is no talk of it yet.
register_succes_text_3: Your login details for the game:
files_text_1: After downloading the clean client, be sure to download the updater and update the game through it.
files_text_2: Don't forget to subscribe to our Telegram channel and Telegram group, where you can freely communicate with players and the administrator.
about.short.title: Short Description
about.short.desc1: Donation-free Lineage 2 Interlude server on Classic client. The main focus of the x10 server is on the authenticity of Interlude chronicles for the best gaming experience for our players. For the server administration, the primary goal is to create a comfortable gaming atmosphere where the "PAY2WIN" concept, paid clans, and unfair treatment by the administration to players are completely absent. This is our first launch, so the server description may change or be supplemented.
about.short.desc2: Considering the donation-free concept, the server will be on a paid subscription, which will be announced to players separately. Currently, we are only in the inception stage and are about to roll out to alpha testing. We hope for your understanding, as renting a more powerful machine and other expenses are currently covered from the administration's pocket. Considering future subscriptions, a system for authorizing multiple characters from one game account is enabled. Maximum windows online - 7.
about.short.rate_exp_rb: EXP/SP rate from raid bosses: x10.
about.short.rate_drop_rb: Drop rate from raid bosses: x5
about.short.rate_seal_stone: Seal Stone drop rate: x1, maximum Seal Stone deposit: 10000000
about.short.buff_slots: 20 buff slots, 12 dance-song slots, 8 debuff slots
about.short.champions: Champion monsters level 20+, x10 and x50. Spawn chance: 5% and 2% respectively
about.short.group_bonus: Bonus to EXP/SP for group leveling, from 30% to 67%, increased distance at which drop and experience are received by all group members
about.short.rb_spawn: Raid boss spawn: levels 20-40 - 6 hours + 2 hours random spawn, levels 41-60 - 8 hours + 3 hours random spawn, levels 61+ - 10 hours + 4 hours random spawn.
about.rates.title: Full Rates Description
about.rates.rate_exp_rb: EXP/SP rate from raid bosses: x10.
about.rates.rate_seal_stone: Seal Stone drop rate: x1, maximum Seal Stone deposit: 10000000
about.rates.rate_quest_rewards: Quest drop, rewards, adena, EXP/SP rate: x2
about.rates.rate_items_rb: Item drop rate from raid bosses: x5
about.rift.title: Dimension Rift
about.rift.max_jumps: Maximum number of "jumps" between rooms - 4. After that, the group is sent to the waiting room.
about.group.title: Group Play
about.group.radius: Increased radius in which characters receive rewards in a group, from 1500 units to 5000 units.
about.group.level_diff: Level difference for group leveling: 14 levels.
about.group.bonuses:
Bonuses to EXP/SP for the group, including quest items
2 players in group 30%
3 players in group 39%
4 players in group 50%
5 players in group 54%
6 players in group 58%
7 players in group 63%
8 players in group 65%
9 players in group 67%
about.enchant.title: Enchant
about.enchant.desc1: On our project, enchant chances for weapons, armor, and jewelry vary depending on the current enchant level.
about.enchant.desc2: Maximum weapon enchant = 16. Maximum armor and jewelry enchant - 12. Full body armor (top and bottom in one slot) is guaranteed to enchant to +4 with 100% chance. So the enchant chances are as follows:
about.enchant.blessed: Similarly for blessed scrolls, only +5% to chance. On failure, reset to +0.
about.epic.title: Epic Bosses
about.epic.qa_drop: Ring of Queen Ant drop chance = 100%. Other drop according to canon.
about.epic.orfen_drop: Earring of Orfen drop chance = 100%. Other drop according to canon.
about.epic.orfen_skill: Boss uses player teleport skill to itself
about.epic.core_drop: Ring of Core drop chance = 100%. Other drop according to canon.
about.epic.zaken_doors: Doors on the ship leading to Zaken open during the game night time.
about.epic.zaken_drop: Zaken's Earring drop chance = 100%. Other drop according to canon.
about.epic.baium_quest: Requires completing the quest An Arrogant Search
about.epic.baium_clear: Time after which the zone is cleared if players die: 1 minute
about.epic.baium_time_limit: No time limit for farming Baium.
about.epic.baium_drop: Ring of Baium drop chance = 100%. Other drop according to canon.
about.epic.antharas_exit: Time after which Antharas leaves the lair after at least one group enters the zone: 10 minutes
about.epic.antharas_clear: Time after which the zone is cleared if all players die: 1 minute.
about.epic.antharas_time_limit: No time limit for farming Antharas
about.epic.antharas_drop: Earring of Antharas drop chance = 100%. Other drop according to canon
about.epic.valakas_exit: Time after which Valakas leaves the lair after at least one group enters the zone: 15 minutes
about.epic.valakas_clear: Time after which the zone is cleared if all players die: 1 minute.
about.epic.valakas_time_limit: No time limit for farming Valakas
about.epic.valakas_drop: Necklace of Valakas drop chance = 100%. Other drop according to canon
about.epic.frintezza_parties: Minimum parties in command channel for entry: 2, maximum: 5.
about.epic.frintezza_distance: Minimum distance from NPC for tomb entry: 300 units.
about.epic.frintezza_time_limit: Time limit for path to Frintezza and farming: 35 minutes
about.epic.frintezza_drop: Frintezza's Necklace drop chance = 100%. Other drop according to canon
about.epic.sailren_mob_spawn_time: Time for activating Sailren's "mob spam": 120 minutes.
about.epic.sailren_mob_interval: Spawn time when activating Sailren's "mob spam": 1 minute
about.epic.sailren_clear: Time after which the zone is cleared if all players die: 1 minute.
about.other.title: Other Settings
about.other.karma_stores: Player with karma and/or cursed weapon can use stores
about.other.skill_books: Books for skill learning not required, skills learned from NPC
about.other.skill_gap: Threshold for removing skills from characters depending on skill and character level = 10
about.other.subclass: Subclass - quest required, minimum level for adding subclass - 65, subclass level - 40, maximum subclasses - 3.
about.other.catacombs_check: Teleporter check in catacombs for players registered in the 7 Seals event. Attacking monsters by unregistered players results in teleportation from catacombs. Mammon available only to registered players.
about.other.death_penalty: Chance of receiving Death Penalty after death - 10%. Recovery scrolls available for Player Killer (PK). With active Death Penalty, there is a penalty on EXP gain.
about.other.festival_group: Minimum group size for participation in Festival of Darkness = 5
about.other.four_sep: Quest 4 Goblets (Four Sepulchers) enabled, minimum players for entry: 4, entry every 55 minutes.
about.other.aug_items: Augmented items (from Life Stone) can be traded, sold, and dropped
about.other.song_dance_mp: When using songs and dances (song and dance), MP consumption increases. MP consumption does not increase if dance/song time is less than 10 seconds.
about.buffer.title: Buffer
about.buffer.header: Newbie Guide and Adventure Guildmans Buffers
about.buffer.intro:
Our server features a buffer system in the Newbie Guide and Adventure Guildmans to maximize content authenticity.
The buffer was designed to simplify leveling in the early and middle stages of the game, and partially at high levels, while not devaluing the buffer professions.
Buffers provide various buffs depending on the character's level and class.
